locale.name: en

gender.form: Hi! I'm :name:! Let's start - choose your appearance first.
Hi! I'm :name:! Let's start - choose your appearance first.
Congratulations on purchasing your own apartment. Now it's time to invite your friends to the housewarming party!
Congratulations on purchasing your own apartment. Now it's time to invite your friends to the housewarming party!
You're making progress! There are many exciting tasks ahead, which will help you learn about the world of Avataria.
You're making progress! There are many exciting tasks ahead, which will help you learn about the world of Avataria.
Hey, buddy, it's great to see you! Ready to have some fun?
Hey, girlfriend, it's great to see you! Ready to have some fun?
But before we can go out, I need to finish installing a fountain. Can you help me?
But before we can go out, I need to finish installing a fountain. Can you help me?
Are you going to the club dressed like that? I'm sure you'll find something you'll like in my wardrobe!
Are you going to the club dressed like that? I'm sure you'll find something you'll like in my wardrobe!
You look great! Let's pop by the cafe for a cup of coffee first.
You look great! Let's pop by the cafe for a cup of coffee first.
This was nice. But now it's time we head to the club.
This was nice. But now it's time we head to the club.
And here we are at the club! Ready to have a blast?
And here we are at the club! Ready to have a blast?
Well, did you dance your shoes off? We can hang out some more, or we can go back to my place.
Well, did you dance your shoes off? We can hang out some more, or we can go back to my place.
Now that was a heck of a time... Have you thought about an apartment of your own?
Now that was a heck of a time... Have you thought about an apartment of your own?

locale.message: Do you really want to finish the tutorial?
You will receive 10 gold coins for every friend, who join the game!
See what other interesting tasks you have to perform
How are you doing? Long time no see!
It's so great to see you!
Place the fountain in the room by dragging it with your mouse. Then tap Save.
Now tap on the fountain to select it
Pick out an outfit, then tap Save to change your clothes.
Tap to go to the cafe
To make your avatar dance, tap on it and select Dance.
That was fun. Have you thought about getting your own place?
Tap "Places" to go to the cafeteria.
So, are you having fun? We can stay a little longer or go back to my place.
You look great! Let's go to the cafeteria for a cup of coffee.
To start dancing, tap on your avatar and select "Dance".
It was fun. But it's time to go to the club.
Congratulations for buying your own apartment! Let's invite all of your friends here for party
Are you ready for the party? But before we go, I have to install a new fountain. Can you help me?
I bet you don't want to go to the club looking like this. Look inside my wardrobe and pick something better for yourself.
I bet you don't want to go to the club looking like this. Check the wardrobe, you've got to have something better.
Tap to order a cup of coffee.
Choose your room and tap here to buy it.
To invite your friends tap on add friend icon.
Congratulations for buying your own apartment! To invite your friends tap on Friends tab.
Drag it to the room and then tap "Save".
Let me check what's on the market.
An original design for a bright personality. Like to stand out in the crowd? Then this apartment is for you!
Laconic style and design. Simple and tasteful.
If you seek warmth and tenderness, this apartment is your best bet. Everyone will love its soft tones and stylish interior design.
Comfort and coziness is what separates this apartment from the rest.
A wonderful view and minimum furniture. An ideal option for those who prefer to make renovations themselves.
An original design for a bright personality. Like to stand out in the crowd? Then this apartment is for you!
